Here is my code:

} public void newobjects() { makeGlobalObject(2619, 3085, 9356, -3, 10);//Cave In front of yanille - That means the way to for the object to face. 0 = west | -1 = north | -2 = east | -3 = south.

The object becomes on all heights… If I climb upstairs its there even if i put it downstairs.
